dt: coming or happening by good luck especially unexpectedly

dt.t: a {it}happy{/it} discovery, finding the letter that would prove her innocence
made bread for the first time and was {it}happy{/it} with the tasty result

dt: feeling that one's needs or desires have been met

dt.t: has been much {it}happier{/it} ever since she moved
the {it}happy{/it} person who is both appreciated and rewarded for all his hard work

dt: meeting the requirements of a purpose or situation

dt.t: the wine was a {it}happy{/it} complement to such a fine meal
poll-{it}happy{/it} pundits just care about which political candidate is winning, and never about the issues

shortdef: coming or happening by good luck especially unexpectedly
feeling that one's needs or desires have been met

dt.t: he is completely {it}happy-go-lucky{/it} on fishing trips—if he catches something, fine; if he doesn't, that's fine, too

dt: having or showing freedom from worries or trouble

dt.t: went on her {it}happy-go-lucky{/it} way, totally unaware that she was strewing litter behind her

shortdef: having or showing freedom from worries or trouble

sls: plural of {d_link|happy hunting ground|happy hunting ground}
